Posts.EditableText:
**PRE-ALPHA RELEASE**

This is my first game to be released with Quest. It is an RPG-type game that can be said to be in early access. I wanted to publish it early in the development, so I could take feedbacks and ideas that could make this game better into consideration early on and shape the game better with help of those.

Currently; this game has these features in:
* Sleep and exercise
* Work
* Hunger system (you have to buy, cook and eat food)
* Basic conversations
* Day/night cycle
* Additional actions (playing basketball, etc.)

You can access the game from here:
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/iz2-oworeeu9icq26cpp3q/street-rpg

**PRE-BETA (BETA 1) RELEASE**

I released Pre-Beta version as Beta 1, with new features like:

* Ambience sounds (incomplete)
* New verbs and commands (some incomplete)
* Some small fixes

Full game will probably be released after a Beta 2 update.

Posts.EditableText:
**BETA (BETA 2) DEVELOPMENT UPDATE**

I found some time this week to work on Beta (Beta 2) version.

I've added the ability to participate in street races, buy/sell some commodities and even upgrade them to make more money.  I've added a few more characters to interact with, so you can have a bigger influence in your environment.

I plan to add some additional activities and characters. The game currently has six main territories, with a seventh under the way.
Posts.HTML:

I found some time this week to work on Beta (Beta 2) version.

I've added the ability to participate in street races, buy/sell some commodities and even upgrade them to make more money. I've added a few more characters to interact with, so you can have a bigger influence in your environment.

I plan to add some additional activities and characters. The game currently has six main territories, with a seventh under the way.

Posts.EditableText:
**BETA (BETA 2) RELEASE**

I just updated the game to BETA/BETA 2 version.

So far, the game might have one of largest landscapes for a Quest-developed text-adventure game, with over 25 rooms to visit. It also has over 30 specific verbs/commands for general gameplay. The environment is dynamic and changeable, but more features regarding that needs to be implied.

The finished version is most likely to come in September, and will likely to be released in more than just textadventures.co.uk. I'm confident in this game, and it might be one of best games developed in Quest (I actually fiddled with Quest a little bit back in the day, so me being familiar with it helped with development).

I'm also off of internship, so development might speed up until the final release comes out.
Posts.HTML:
BETA (BETA 2) RELEASE

I just updated the game to BETA/BETA 2 version.

So far, the game might have one of largest landscapes for a Quest-developed text-adventure game, with over 25 rooms to visit. It also has over 30 specific verbs/commands for general gameplay. The environment is dynamic and changeable, but more features regarding that needs to be implied.

The finished version is most likely to come in September, and will likely to be released in more than just textadventures.co.uk. I'm confident in this game, and it might be one of best games developed in Quest (I actually fiddled with Quest a little bit back in the day, so me being familiar with it helped with development).

I'm also off of internship, so development might speed up until the final release comes out.
